body.name: Norme 4 Sets Kids Broom and Dustpan Set 20.5 inch, 32 inch Mini Broom with Dustpan for Kids Toddler Cleaning Set with Adjustable Handle Mini Broom & Dustpan Set Children Little Housekeeping Helper Set
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 8 mins
features: Be A Happy Little Helper: the package contains 4 blue kids broom and dustpan sets that are suitable for use in the home or at kindergarten; These tools encourage children to participate in cleaning activities and can even inspire their creativity

Flexible and Adjustable Size: the kids broom can be customized to fit their height, ranging from 20.5 to 32 inches; This allows you to adjust the length based on your child's requirements; Additionally, the accompanying dustpan is compact, measuring approximately 15.5 x 6.2 x 4.7 inches, making it simple to store

Quality Material: the small broom and dustpan set is crafted from quality PP plastic and nylon material that is safe, lightweight, sleek, and long lasting; The ergonomic handle is designed to provide a non slip and comfortable grip for children

Practical Slot Design: the slot's design allows for the small broom to be easily attached to the handle of the toddler broom set when not in use, thereby saving space; Additionally, gifting children with a dustpan is a nice idea

Kids Broom for Many Uses: the mini broom and dustpan set we offer is made of soft and dense materials, making it a nice option for cleaning up dust, small and lightweight objects, and more; It can be applied to various surfaces such as floors, sofas, bedrooms, tables, dining tables, keyboards, laptops, and even for cleaning up cat waste; Additionally, the broom comes with a hanging loop on the top piece for easy storage when not in use
body.description: Features: The toddler cleaning set includes 4 blue brooms and dustpans that may be applied at home or in kindergarten. These tools encourage children to engage in cleaning tasks and can even stimulate their creativity. The toddler broom and cleaning set is built of soft and dense materials, making it an ideal choice for cleaning up dust, small and lightweight objects, and other debris. It can be applied to clean floors, sofas, bedrooms, tables, dining tables, keyboards, laptops, and even cat excrement. The broom also includes a hanging loop on the top piece for simple storage when not in use. Specifications: Material: PP plastic and nylonColor: blueSize: Small broom: about 20.5 to 32 inches adjustable heightDust pan: about 15.5 x 6.2 x 4.7 inchesPackage includes: 4 x Mini broom and dustpan setNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One came completely broken
reviews.reviewText: You had to put them completely together and one of the pieces for the handle was completely cracked and made one whole broom unusable. But the ones that did assemble correctly work well for my 1st and 2nd grade class.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are great! And NOT just for kids!
reviews.reviewText: And that's why I've taken a star off of my score. At the time of this review, I haven't seen any of this type of broom and dustpan that doesn't just say it's for kids. These could just as easily be marketed to adults as well. You know, how about a grey one that looks war torn and has a radiation symbol on it? Lol... Heck, one of these broom and dustpan sets functions way better than any mini broom and dustpan set that I've ever had! Before I had one of these, if I wanted to quickly sweep up the area around my computer chair without moving the chair and all, I'd use a mini broom and dustpan set. And to sweep everything into the dustpan I'd have to bend way down to the ground... But not anymore. I just leave the middle piece out and only use the rod piece that would be the end of the broom, and I can sweep all around my computer chair without breaking my back like I used to. What's more, the broom part with the bristles works REALLY well.
